title: Ticket #4855: windows failure of job-router and local universe developer series
description:
Only in the developer series with these configuration settings 

JOB_ROUTER_DEFAULTS = \
  [ \
    requirements=target.WantJobRouter is True; \
    delete_WantJobRouter = true; \
    set_requirements = true; \
  ]

JOB_ROUTER_ENTRIES = \
   [ TargetUniverse = 12; \
     name = "Site 1"; \
   ]

DAEMON_LIST = MASTER, SCHEDD, JOB_ROUTER, COLLECTOR, NEGOTIATOR

JOB_ROUTER_POLLING_PERIOD = 10

When submit a simple sleep job the schedd gets into a loop with the following log entries 

01/28/15 18:50:34 (pid:17224) Sent ad to central manager for condor-slot1@exec-11.batlab.or
g
